name: White_Bird
text:
White Bird
White Bird was a Nez Perce chief who escaped captivity of the United States military and joined Sitting Bull in Canada.
General Oliver Howard blamed his escape on Chief Joseph, determining this to be a violation of Joseph's terms of surrender, thus absolving the government's responsibility to return the Nez Perce to their land.
Behind the scenes
White Bird (unknown – March 6, 1892), also referred to as White Pelican, was a Nez Perce leader, war chief, and shaman who refused to surrender to the American military and escaped to Canada, where he remained until his murder at the hands of a fellow Nez Perce.
